name: 75 Years of the Rivne Oblast
generalDescription: The coin is dedicated to the region that musters more than 600 explored mineral deposits, being the basalt and amber ones unique among them. Rivnenshchyna means a unique ensemble of castles, picturesque landscapes, substantial forestlands. The Rivne Oblast is situated on the north-west of Ukraine and characterized by an advantageous geographical setting and developed transportation system; in its industry the production of linen, non-woven fabrics, particle boards, plywood, chemical fertilizers and energy is dominant.
averseDescription: Obverse: bears the Small Coat of Arms of Ukraine (above) with the semicircular inscriptions НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (National Bank of Ukraine) above and П`ЯТЬ ГРИВЕНЬ (five hryvnias) beneath; to the right there is the mark of the National Bank of Ukraine Mint; in the center there is the conventionalized composition: the images of the Saint George Friary on the Cossacks` Tombs with the coin issue year indication 2014 thereunder, a fragment of the Dubno Castle (to the right), the conventionalized image of the Ostroh Bible, against the background of the ornamental composition of flowers, and the Peaceful Atom symbol.
reverseDescription: Reverse: bears the Oblast coat of arms with the semicircular inscriptions: РІВНЕНСЬКА ОБЛАСТЬ (Rivne Oblast) above and ЗАСНОВАНА У 1939 РОЦІ (established in 1939 year) below.
